page.title: 20END OF TERM - SUMMER 1985
page.content: THIS IS AN EXTRACT FROM THE NEWSLETTER SENT OUT TO ALL PARENTS ETC, AT THE END OF TERM. TERM IS RAPIDLY DRAWING TO A CLOSE,WITH {SPORTS' DAY}AND THE { {SINGING FESTIVAL}STILL TO COME THIS WEEK. ON THE LAST DAY OF TERM, WE SHALL HOLD A FINAL ASSEMBLY IN THE AFTERNOON AT WHICH VARIOUS TROPHIES WILL BE PRESENTED. WE SHALL ALSO WELCOME BACK MRS. OGLETHORPE TO AWARD BIBLES WHICH SHE HAS KINDLY DONATED. SCHOOL WILL END AT APPROXIMATELY 2.30 P.M.. THE SCHOOL BUSES WILL NOT RUN. THE NEW YEAR WILL BEGIN ON MONDAY,9TH SEPTEMBER. THE NEW FIRST YEAR INTAKE WILL REPORT TO SCHOOL AT 9.45 A.M. YEARS 2 - 5 SHOULD REPORT TO THEIR NEW FORM ROOMS AT 11.00A.M. WE ARE SORRY TO SAY GOODBYE TO MRS.SMITH WHO IS RETIRING AFTER MANY YEARS AS HEAD OF HOME ECONOMICS.
